defect_instance_type.description: Checks if the generated defect is an instance of the Vacancy class.

vacancy_count_for_specific_species.description: Verifies the number of vacancies generated for a specific species, in this case, Gallium (Ga).

invalid_species_error.description: Ensures that a ValueError is raised when attempting to generate vacancies for a non-existent species, such as Xenon (Xe).
